Prerequisites

Psionics (Any) 5 ranks, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.6OfmqdWPGxSUipql]{Initiate Circle Power}

Benefits

The Psion can change the point of origin of their abilities, up to 30â€™ away from their location. They must be able to visually see the location they wish to use as their origin point.
